PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-02832010-03-11,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActJudges Act
SubjectNational Judicial Study Leave Fellowship Program ** LEAVE ** Sept. 1, 2010 to April 30, 2011
PrecisOrder granting a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to ten Judges from September 1, 2010 to April 30, 2011, in order to allow them to participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM.
AttachmentsAttachment
